job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services. Your technical knowledge will drive our backend architecture and mentor the engineering team.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Staff Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services. Your technical knowledge will drive our backend architecture and mentor the engineering team.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend development, API creation, and data collection/ingestion services using Go. While it mentions mentoring and driving architecture, it lacks specific details about AI/ML model development, generative AI techniques, or the application of AI in its core responsibilities. The emphasis is on traditional software engineering and backend systems, not on AI-specific roles.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'backend development', 'delivering product features', and 'developing backend APIs', which are core software development activities.
Focusing on 'delivering product features' is a direct responsibility within software development.
The phrase 'developing backend APIs' is a specific task within software development, particularly for backend systems.
The mention of 'data collection and ingestion services' falls under the umbrella of data engineering, as it involves building systems to gather and process data.
The role involves driving 'backend architecture' and mentoring, which requires understanding the business context and technical strategy.
The description highlights a 'lean team' where 'everyone's voice is heard' and mentions 'mentoring the engineering team', indicating a collaborative environment and communication needs.
The statement 'there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions' suggests a need for initiative and ownership.
job_tasks.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'operate efficiently and pragmatically' directly points to a pragmatic approach to problem-solving.

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
